alert.note: Alert for Cloud; Republic (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:24PM CDT until July 28 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Republic County in north central Kansas... Northern Cloud County in north central Kansas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 523 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Norway, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Concordia, Belleville and Norway. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
